Alhambra.Colorado Street Bridge (Pasadena, Califo:
The Colorado Street Bridge is a historic concrete arch bridge spanning the Arroyo Seco in Pasadena, California.


== History ==
The Colorado Street Bridge was designed and built in 1912 at a total cost of $191,000 (equivalent to $4,666,492 in 2017). The bridge was designed by the firm of Waddell & Harrington, based in Kansas City, Missouri.
